page.description: SetWebSiteHostNameAndCertificate sets the host name (DNS name) and certificate name for a web site belonging to the current subscription.
page.prototype: .SetWebSiteHostNameAndCertificate as L (WebSiteName as C, HostName as C, CertificateName as C)

argument.name: WebSiteName
argument.description: The name of the web site to associate the certificate with.

argument.name: HostName
argument.description: The host name (usually the certificate name, but this could be a host name embeded in the certificate).

argument.name: CertificateName
argument.description: The name of the certificate previously uploaded to Alpha Cloud.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns .t. if the function call succeeded and .f. if it failed. Look at the CallResult property to determine the cause of a failure.
